This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Select with appearance:base-select should open and close when clicking the button.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'ownerDocument')"
[FAIL] Clicking an option in an appearance:base-select select should choose the option and close the popover.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'ownerDocument')"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
